abstract: United Nations peacekeepers in Central African Republic seize Rodrigue Ngaibona, Christian militia leader accused of launching attacks on civilians throughout country.
lead_paragraph: A leader of a Christian militia who has been implicated in attacks on civilians throughout the country has been arrested by United Nations peacekeepers, the country’s senior prosecutor said Sunday.
snippet: A leader of a Christian militia who has been implicated in attacks on civilians throughout the country has been arrested by United Nations peacekeepers, the country’s senior prosecutor said Sunday.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Peacekeepers Arrest a Christian Militia Commander
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Peacekeepers Arrest a Christian Militia Commander
